title: Chile : gender gap index 2014 to 2018
summary: The graph presents the gender gap Index in Chile from 2014 to 2018 .
In 2018 , Chile scored 0.72 , which shows a gender gap of approximately 28 % ( women are 28 % less likely than men to have equal opportunities ) .
That same Year , the gender gap in the area of political empowerment in Chile amounted to 72 % .
